description: Documents required for permit issuance and plan requirements

contractor_requirements: Certificate of Workman's Compensation Insurance Coverage
State of California contractor's license and classification (pocket card)

authorization.non_owners: Owner authorization letter dated within past 30 days
authorization.final_declaration: Form confirming disclosures and project authorization
authorization.llc_owners: Written proof of partnership or verification from CA Secretary of State

payment.who_can_pay: Only authorized agents or property owners

validity: All documents must be currently valid (no expired materials)
Business tax registration certificates must be current
Recent property acquisitions require recorded grant deed or property tax statement

no_plans_needed: Replace windows/doors in-kind (same size and location)
Replace or repair exterior siding in-kind
Repair less than 50% of deck/exterior stairs (without new firewalls)
Remodel kitchen or bathroom without changing floor plan, moving walls, or adding fixtures
plans_requirements.plans_required: All other projects require architectural plans
plans_requirements.submission: In-kind replacements via PermitSF portal; others bring 2 sets of plans
